title: MBR Grub Editor to Create Recovery

forumNotes.author: Hima
forumNotes.content:
![Posted Image](http://reboot.pro/index.php?app=downloads&module=display§ion=screenshot&id=541) **File Name** : MBR Grub Editor to Create Recovery **File Submitter** : [Hima](http://reboot.pro/user/35114-hima/ "") **File Submitted** : 07 Feb 2015 **File Category** : [Boot tools](http://reboot.pro/files/category/7-boot-tools/ "") MBR Grub Editor is a freeware that allows you to create recovery environment by F number message "F1,F2,F3,...etc" it can also to repair mbr and edit boot to windows XP,V,7,8/8,1,10 it work in all of windows version. \* Requirements : For all windows (32/64) There Netframework 2 or higher \* Key Features: . create recovery environment by F number . supported Grub4dos only . contain of Grub4dos simple commands and simple notepad . edit windows bootsector . fix mbr . supported all windows (32/64)
\* Mechanisms of action grubinst, fixmbr \* How to use 1. Setup Mbr Grub Editor and run it as administrator 2. Choose a F number and press put to put ibrldr and menu.lst to recovery partition or windows partition and agree to copy files 3. Edit men.lst (in "c:\\") by mbr grub editor program or any other notepad programs and copy your boot files image same you want 4. if you want to remove recovery msg, click remove recov msg button thanks for grub4dos developers mbrfix developers reboot.pro regards Hima [Click here to download this file](http://reboot.pro/files/file/541-mbr-grub-editor-to-create-recovery/ "")
